name: lebua at State Tower
address: State Tower 1055/111 Silom Road, Bangrak, Bang Rak, 10500 Bangkok, Thailand
rooms: ['Superior Family Suite (2 Adults + 2 Children)', 'Special Offer - Superior Suite', 'Three-Bedroom Executive Suite', 'Family Suite with River View (2 Adults + 2 Children)', 'Special Offer - Tower Club Suite with City View', 'Superior Suite', 'Suite with River View', 'Tower Club Suite with City View', 'Tower Club Suite with River View', 'Two-Bedroom Suite', 'Two Bedroom Tower Club Luxury Suites']

booking.com data: {'score': '8.8', 'description': 'Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at lebua at State Tower One of our top picks in Bangkok. The luxurious lebua at State Tower is located in Bangkok’s Silom Area, overlooking the Chao Phraya River. The hotel offers a rooftop restaurant and a free shuttle to Saphan Taksin BTS Station. Guests enjoy free WiFi, which is available throughout.The modern suites feature beautiful views of the city and river. All come with a TV, DVD players and large en suite bathrooms with free toiletries. They also have a kitchenette and a living area.Guests can swim at the outdoor lagoon pool or enjoy a relaxing massage treatment. The hotel provides a well-equipped gym and steam room.The open-air Sirocco Restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes and offers spectacular city views. Cocktails and drinks are served at Sky Bar. A daily buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the poolside Café Mozu. Other dining options include Breeze, Mezzaluna and Distil.lebua at State Tower is approximately 21.7 miles from Suvarnabhumi Airport.Bang Rak is a great choice for travelers interested in Chinatown, history and convenient public transportation.', 'points': {'Location': '8.6', 'Comfort': '9.1', 'Staff': '8.9', 'Cleanliness': '9.2', 'Free WiFi': '7.7', 'Facilities': '8.9'}}
reviews1: [{'points': {'Location': '4 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Excellent hotel.......', 'body': 'Stayed here twice back in April/May, off season and it was excellent value. Rooms were vast, travelling solo I hardly knew what to do with all the room. Two sitting rooms. Two bathrooms. Two balconies. Kitchen, just one!!! 58th? floor, great view of Bangkok. First stay, I met with friends for dinner in the Sirocco Restaurant, great food but definitely not cheap. Foi gras, tuna cooked perfectly. Lighting could better there, the staff have torches to help one read the menu (!!) and although warm it is no doubt called the Sirocco because of the breeze, no, wind!! For breakfast the Lebua has to be one of the best places anywhere. The choice is vast and the quality is very good. Throughout the hotel the staff are superb. Although you may get an excellent valued room you will find everything else is commensurate with a 5* hotel.'}, {'points': {'Location': '4 of 5 stars', 'Service': '4 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '4 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '4 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Great Stay!', 'body': "My husband and I booked at Lebua for our two nights in Bangkok on our trip through Thailand and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The views are awesome up on the roof at the Sky Bar. We just got a drink to enjoy the view. The second day we were there, the battery of our room key card died so we couldn't get in our room. The staff immediately got the hotel engineer to come up and fix the situation. We got a formal apology from the hotel manager and he personally got us a private car to take us to the airport the next day. We were very well taken car of here. Friendly staff and great location!"}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Hotel review', 'body': 'Hotel is gorgeous. Went there in 2010 i think. Dont know why but my dad booked the 3 room suite for the 4 of us. The views were stunning. Chocolates were provided and toileteries were bvlgari brand. Theres also a nice bar at the rooftop. Heres where a scene from hangover was shot too'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Absolutely superb', 'body': "I booked 2 nights at Lebua at state tower for our anniversary, and so glad I did. We got picked up in a series 7 bmw which was really quite nice, and given cool drink with a cool wet orange rind scented towel. A short trip to the hotel where we were given a warm welcome by reception. On arrival they told us they had upgraded our room to a high floor with a river view. There was a dozen red roses waiting in our room and a chocolate mud cake with happy anniversary written on it. Up at the roof top bar we had some of the best cocktails I've ever had (and I consider myself to be quite experienced with cocktails). The room was huge! The bed super comfy. The room service was quick. All in all id say spend the extra money and experience this place you won't be disappointed."}, {'points': {'Service': '2 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '3 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '2 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '2 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Concierge staff with no integrity towards guests', 'body': "I had a good impression 2 years ago of Lebua. But not this time. It's totally disappointing with the low integrity of the Concierge staff (Mr S, on duty on Sunday 21Aug at 2am) who sided with the taxi driver, who was overcharging me upon reaching the hotel at 2am, from the Suvarnabhumi International airport. The taxi driver DARE NOT issue me with a receipt as I asked. I took a photo of the meter and his car plate as well. The meter read THB 281, Highway is THB75, Airport charge is THB50. Which comes up to only THB406. But taxi driver asked for THB450. It's not that anyone minds giving tips, but who will reward dishonest people? and to think that when i asked the Hotel staff for help to stand up for me, he actually sided with the driver, saying that it is correct due to airport charge. This is absurd.Later, I checked into my Superior City View Suite. But at 3am, it was so noisy that you can hardly sleep in. So I asked them to change to a quieter room, so they said they could only upgrade me to another room but on smoking floor, which i could not accept. But they were full house, as i was told.As i could not take the smoking, i decided to check out immediately to another hotel nearby as i really needed a proper quiet place to sleep at that wee hour, even though they said they can't refund me anything, since i've paid for the room rates through online website.I will never step into this hotel ever, as they do not value own guests, and only side with dishonest taxi drivers. Room quality is low and old. I cannot imagine it being 5 star rated here for this kind of price i have to pay for this level of service and room is old though looks clean on the upfront.Not sure if the rest could be trusted, as the reservation says they are full house and only could give me the alternate option of smoking floor room. But when i decided to check out immediately, duty manager Mr Kritthanathat Kultanachot said he was trying to upgrade me to another room ! (just only after i checked out ?? before that, it was full house, right?) Probably most tourists are impressed by their F&B outlet - Bar at roof /Nice view from top of the State Tower. Thats all."}, {'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Great location, perfect for a short trip', 'body': 'We stayed here on our tour of Thailand. When you have limited time, this is the perfect hotel. We only stayed two nights and it was perfect. Close to the river, so you can take river taxis to tourist attractions. The staff spoke English and were extremely helpful with directions, etc. Rooms are all suites, it was a beautiful view of Bangkok. Breakfast buffet was really great. They also do luggage storage for after you check out and allow you to use their facilities after you check out for the day (perfect for travelers with a later flight).The sky bar on the roof was also amazing, great views, although super overpriced drinks. Still worth going for a drink to see the view.'}]
reviews2: [{'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Amazing hotel just beware of taxis at lobby ', 'body': 'This hotel is the best i have stayed in ...room is amazing and views are stunning ...staff are also just so nice .... Definitely a luxery hotel without the priceAs I said watch out for taxis outside (this has nothing to do with the hotel itself )...We were on the last night of our holiday and said why not go to a ping pong show we were unsure but trusted the taxi outside the hotel ( we should not of though as we had been so careful for the rest of the holiday ) he dropped us down a dark ally where we were to pay over 2000 baht to see the show ...we left immediately as we were so scared ... I am leaving his details here .... Best just never to listen to Bangkok taxi drivers sugeestions and do not trust them ...the same goes for strangers on the streets of Bangkok( they are never trying to just help you with directions)'}, {'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars', 'Value': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'A wonderful stay - adding the club package is worth it!', 'body': "The overall quality of the room was wonderful and the staff were very helpful in the lounge and at the hotel's check in. Afternoon tea and views in the lounge were fantastic and the breakfast by the pool was wonderful with a very extensive selection that we enjoyed immensely.the reception we received at the ground floor reception was painfully slow and they didn't seem to know what they were doing"}, {'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '4 of 5 stars', 'Value': '3 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '4 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Great Hotel. Super Clean. Need some renovation.', 'body': 'We stay in Lebua hotel for 4 days . Hotel is great . Super clean bathrooms . Great costumer service. But is getting a little old. My family and I stay in one of the suite carpet was old. Time to do some renovation. Breakfast buffet is super good lot of choices.'}, {'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Faultless', 'body': "What an incredible hotel. Very expensive - although the fabulous rooms were not themselves ridiculously expensive - but wow, what a superb way to end our Thailand holiday. Service was impeccable; breakfasts simply amazing; the Sky Bar a memorable experience. The pool and leisure facilities impressive. And the beds are without doubt the most comfortable beds we have ever slept in. Can't think of anything at all to fault here other than the price of wine!"}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Hotel', 'body': "Excellent five star hotel with great river view if you are lucky. I was upgraded to a suit with spacious sitting room and spare room. Can't ask for more.Service is excellent with good care. Good choice! Breakfast has a lot of choice. They use real fire to make your roost. First in my life. Lunch is also good!"}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Perfect way to end our trip', 'body': "My boyfriend and I travelled Asia for a month and thought we would treat ourselves to this hotel on our last night. So so glad that we did!! The staff were very attentive and polite. We had a suite on the 54th floor and the room was gorgeous. The view from the balcony was breath taking!!! It was our last day so we made use of the balcony and watched the sun set and the skyline at night time. Unfortunately we weren't aware of the dress code for the sky bar prior to our holiday. Ensure you read up on this before going!! However we didn't mind because we had such an amazing view from our room. Will remember it forever."}]
reviews3: [{'points': {'Location': '1 of 5 stars', 'Service': '1 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '3 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '1 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'terrible', 'body': 'I first stayed here 2 weeks ago for a week in a tower suite.Im currently staying in a lower floor room.The first week was just so unimpresive in a way im glad ive stayed in the lower floor room the elevators are quicker and im not being stalked by the elevator attendants who are located on the tower suite floors.To sum it all up this hotel is living on the hangover dream.Ordered room service pathetic.Breakfast same boring offering everyday.Drinks by the pool lol skybar prices for a guy in a sports apparel lol delivering a beer and a martini with dry ice in a dirty tea bag for 1200 baht ffs its not the skybar sitting at a 2bit pool and seriously a pathetic pool.II fell for the hangover experience never again.Thankfully im staying at the intercontinental on my last leg of my trip.'}, {'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'A Luxury stay.', 'body': 'Upon arriving we were sincerely welcomed(the thais are always welcoming) asked to take a seat in the lobby while staff checked us in, there was a bit of confusion over non smoking reservation and we were upgraded :) Our suite was excellent, living area,bathroom with shower and bathing area, double bedroom, kithcen, dining area and 2 balconies. card entry to access rooms on floor. bar/resturant area, Dome are all a must see... great cocktails, great chablis, great atmosphere, very busy but its bangkok after all.'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Splendid!', 'body': 'Since i joined tripadvisor, i recalled my visit to this hotel which was a lovely experience, great to hang out with friends especially at the skybar which was certainly an experience that wont be forgotten!Highly would recommend if stopping at bangkokWell priced too considering it is a 5 star.'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '4 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Good stay at Lebua', 'body': 'Three nights at Lebua.Arrived at 7.30am, check in slightly difficult as we had arranged an early check in. They had problems granting it but we were in the room for 8.15am in the end.Good room, 54 floor. Small kitchenette, sitting area (could have done with a tv). Sliding dividing doors with large mirrors.Barhroom pleasant with large walk in shower, medium sized bath. Large sink area with two sizes of mirror.Breakfast was great at Mozu, large selection.'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '4 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Luxury indeed', 'body': 'Fantastic hotel with friendly staff. Attention to all details in the rooms. Got an upgrade to a higher floor which was appreciated..fantastic views over the city. Well worth it! Location was great..relatively close to malls and the Chao Phraya River and BTS skyline station.'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Super hotel.', 'body': "We booked two nights, and had a fantastic welcome from the moment we arrived. Our room was not quiet ready when we had done the checking in at 1.30 pm. We were seated in the pool area while waiting for the room, which were fine, but when they say that you can check in from 2pm it's not ok to have to wait for your room until 2.45. We had a fantastic suite on floor 55 with view to the riverside, and it's breathtaking to stand on the balcony and see all the lights as the darkness falls. After a good nights sleep, we went to have breakfast and when we arrived there, we gave our room number before we entered the area. While we were eating the first waiter arrived and asked for the room number again, and we were told that breakfast was not included in the room prise. I told him that I was aware of that, and had told at the check in that we wanted breakfast, sp I assumed that it was ok. He then left and after a while another person came and told us that breakfast was not included, and I said that I was aware of it and that we of cause would pay for the meal, and again I mention that I had ordered breakfast at the check in. We were then told to sign the build before leaving, and I said that of cause we would sign. We continued our meal, and suddenly a waiter came with the build and asked for my signature. To us they seemed to be afraid that we would not pay what we had. Before that experience we had a very good expression of the hotel, and everything seemed in order, but we left the breakfast, which was very good by the way, with a bad taste, and the feeling that we were looked upon as criminals."}]
reviews4: [{'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Value': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Our favourite hotel in Bangkok', 'body': 'This is our 4th time staying at Lebua in the tower suites (which is a must) ... How nice it is to come back every time, the staff and the service are sensational. Once we had a slight problem and they were so quick to come and see us and investigate and offer a solution ..again awesome service. We have stayed in many hotels in Bangkok but this is where we call home. The suits are big enough to live in and from the 57th floor you have a spectacular view of the river and Bangkok. The only slight improvement I could suggest (which I have) is water at check in as you may have been stuck in a taxi for a couple of hours after an international flight. We love it here.'}, {'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars', 'Value': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Comfortable, serene, luxurious', 'body': "We had a high-floor one-bedroom river-view suite, and it was great--extremely spacious, comfortable, great service. They unlocked the balcony for us, and the views were impressive. There is no balcony furniture, so it's a place to walk out and admire for a few minutes at a time. There were nice amenities, including robes and an umbrella. The wifi was good, and the breakfast was very, very good. I give it points particularly for having things I love--sushi and carrot juice. There were also omelets, pastries, a carving station, a salad guy, congee, dumplings, and various vaguely Thai and European dishes. The elevator banks are crowded in the evening with young, heavily cologned Westerners in their cocktail finery looking to visit the famous Sky Bar, but there are hotel staff ready to usher guests ahead of the crowd onto the first open elevator. You can catch both the river ferries and the Sky Train a few blocks away. I don't think you can go wrong here."}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Fantastic!', 'body': 'Amazing views of Bangkok, our room was very clean and massive! A birthday cake and an anniversary cake were expecting us in the fridge too, both delicious! We spent one night at the top floor Sky Bar,which was absolutely amazing and the second night the hotel recommended a boat trip-dinner which was exceptional. Breakfast offered a vast choice of food and everything was very tasty. Great service, professional staff and the overall experience was 5 stars. Not sure why it took me so long to write a review about this place!'}, {'points': {'Location': '5 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Expensive, but totally worth it.', 'body': "My absolute favorite place to stay in Thailand (and I've stayed at about 20 hotels, villas, guest houses, and hostels). Book in advance while price is cheap. This is where the Hangover 2 was filmed and the Sky Bar on the room gets packed late at night. Also, the SKy Bar has a dress code later at night (women need to wear dresses and men can't wear jeans or shorts). They require a 5,000 Baht deposit upfront. Don't buy food or drinks here- WAAAY overpriced for Thailand. But if want to indulge yourself, just spend your money on the drinks. Street food/local restaurants have better food. Views are indescribable. Definitely do not miss out on staying at this hotel. You'll kick yourself later if you do."}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Amazing ', 'body': "This is an absolute must if you want to see a great view of Bangkok. It's very pricey and typical English prices for a cocktail- anything between £10 and £15. However, it is worth it for the views and a lovely evening. You also get some nuts and olives which is a nice touch!"}, {'points': {'Service': '4 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars', 'Value': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '4 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Surprisingly not bad, best location!', 'body': "I had some reservations I won't lie because this hotel doesn't have the best reviews per my preference (I don't just take to heart whether people rate high or low, I read what they say is good/bad).But I actually loved this hotel! There wasn't anything I disliked. I had been to Bangkok and past through this hotel so already knew that the common area/market place was somewhat lacking. I was looking for a centralized location with a view so for me and my group this fit the bill. Hotels in Thailand in general are more affordable and felt the price was decent for our standard tower room.We ended up getting the best view of the city and our room was posh. There was nothing I didn't love. Within walking distance to shops and shopping.The food wasn't the best at the rooftop restaurant but there was nothing like eating in the booth overlooking the city. It was worth it and I recommend it, be sure to get the table along the edge.The bar was great but crowded. Again, its a beautiful bar on the rooftop so we mostly just walked around soaking in the night view."}]
reviews6: [{'points': None, 'rating': '4 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Pricey, but Unique', 'body': "This hotel was the most expensive part of our Thailand trip (minus the flights), but it was definitely an experience to remember. Since we were on our honeymoon, they were kind enough to upgrade us to the same floor as the Hangover Suite! Our view was stunning! The food was expensive and nothing to write home about, but the staff's kind attitude made up for it."}, {'points': None, 'rating': '4 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Good but over rated', 'body': 'Only stayed 2 nights before flying home. Booked on Expedia 1 king bed and 2 singles but ended up with 2 queen beds, however they did put us an extra single bed in at our request. Food and drinks very expensive, breakfast amazing choice, service outstanding, room service several times a day. Decor in rooms looking a little tired, and there seems to be an unused shopping mall underneath. Have stayed in better hotels in the world but for the price it was good. Beware they will take credit card or cash deposit which is not mentioned on website or Expedia. On the whole very good.'}, {'points': {'Service': '4 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '4 of 5 stars', 'Value': '3 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '4 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Lovely Stay', 'body': "We stayed in Lebua Tower in July 2016 for 5 nights. We booked a club room on the 53th floor and the view was breath taking! the room is spacious and comfortable. the sky lounge is amaaazing!! we loved the club lounge and their light lunch was perfect. the staff are extremely friendly and helpful. the what we didn't like so much: the lobby is quite small and not what you expect for a 5 star hotel. the breakfast wasn't so great. the rooms were lovely, but not very sound proof! we had some music on one evening (on my mobile phone!) and the people in the next room kept banging our wall until we turned it off!"}, {'points': {'Location': '5 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Top of the world', 'body': 'This hotel excels in service. If you stay here, you should really take advantage of their efforts to please you as a visitor. We also ate in the top restaurant and their holistic handling of the whole stay was pure pleasure. We got a very large room high up with a river view. Can be recommended. Room was not 100% chick according to new design and whatnot, but it cannot pull down the total impression. If I go back and feel like spoiling my wife, I will go to the same place.'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '3 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'A bit tired', 'body': 'We were a bit disappointed as instead of the stated city view, we had a view of an adjacent building. We spoke to staff about this and were moved to a different suite after the first night. The suite we had was very spacious which was great but the decor and fit out certainly did not meet the expectations of 5 star. The interior of the rooms badly needs a makeover. The staff, however, were great. They were very friendly and helpful which redeemed the tired interior.'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Fancy place. Loved the Tower Club benefits.', 'body': 'We stayed at Lebua for 4 nights during our honeymoon around Thailand. We reserved a Tower Club Suite. Upon arrival, we were taken to the special Tower Club reception area on the 51st floor where we were offered coffee, tea and cookies. They placed us in a suite on the 52nd floor with a beautiful river view balcony. The room was very spacious. The first night we were brought a complimentary honeymoon cake. The second night they delivered a bouquet of roses. Really sweet and set the mood for our honeymoon. The breakfast buffet was excellent. A huge variety of foods from all over the world. We also really enjoyed the Tower club benefits which has a complimentary light lunch and free drinks at the Breeze Restaurant on the 52nd floor. The waitresses were all really nice and great service there. We also received 2 free drinks at the Distil bar on the 64th floor. We went our last night. Be aware that cocktails there are extremely expensive (around 15-20 euros each) but it was a nice atmosphere and the sky dome is cool to see. Only issue we had was that the water pressure in the shower was a bit off. Went from hot to cold randomly. Also it was annoying that my husband could not smoke on the balcony because it was a "non-smoking" room. I think they should allow you to smoke on the balcony. They did offer us a smoking room but the only room available was one with 2 queen size beds. Anyway this hotel is amazing. One of the nicest places I\'ve stayed at in my life.'}]
reviews7: [{'points': None, 'rating': '3 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'View top, extremely commercialized', 'body': 'The view on top is incredible and the drinks that can be bought to get access to the skybar arw delicious.However, there are areas in which photos are not allowed at all and depending on the time you have to queue to walk to the "Hangover"-Area.'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Doing what it does best', 'body': 'We stay at Lebua every time we come to Bangkok which is usually 2-3 times a year and we have been doing so for the past 12 plus years and the hotel never fails. This time we stayed for 4 nights last week before going down to Hua Hin where we subsequently decided to change plans in order to have one more night at Lebua on the way back. Each time, no matter the length of stay, no matter the season, no matter anything, Lebua is always there, like a comfortable armchair, ready to welcome you back.Thank you once again to the marvellous staff especially the porters, this place is truly home and we look forward to returning again very soon'}, {'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars', 'Value': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Great experience for fair money', 'body': 'Wonderful Hotel, the staff is incredibly polite and friendly. Breakfast area is stunning, fantastic food variety and quality. Was indeed a great experience for a fair price. The suites are amazingly big with private balcony and a stunning view over Bangkok'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Amazing views', 'body': 'We had booked a room at the 55th floor with a river view. The view is mind blowing!! The facilities are great including the restaurants and pool. The place is very neat and clean. Highly recommended!!'}, {'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Thailand', 'body': 'My time in Bangkok was incredible and additionally so because of my stay at this hotel. It is a beautiful room with your own balcony overlooking the city. The staff was amazing and went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. The Spa was incredible and the jet lag massage was AMAZING and I highly recommend treating yourself to that experience. I am still smiling over my trip to Thailand and this hotel was a big part of that wonderful experience.'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '2 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Very dissapointed', 'body': "We were very disappointed with our stay here. The greeting staff were quite rude upon arrival. The room was a little dated and smelt musty. There were no benefits of staying here whilst using the sky bar. They treated you the same as any other guest just visiting for a one off drink. We were not even allowed to have a drink at the bar at the bottom of the outside restaurant area which I thought was appalling. I think this is over hyped because of 'the hangover' movie. Would not recommend staying here."}]
reviews8: [{'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Everyone should stay here if you are in BKK. Nothing to beat it.', 'body': 'If you are staying in Bangkok I cannot recommend Le Bua highly enough. The service is great, the rooms amazing and the views unbeatable. Without doubt treat yourselves that little bit more and stay in the Club rooms with access to the stunning Club lounge, the best I have experienced., offering great food all day and an astonishing array of alcoholic drinks all day until 1800.Plus this is the home to the Sky Bar which cannot be missed. Sooo cool.Stay here, you will not regret it.'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Great hotel and amazing service!', 'body': 'My wife and I stayed here while in Bangkok for 5 days. When we got to the hotel, bell service greeted us with a smile and handled all of our luggage.The staff member who checked us in explained everything we needed to know and they did request a deposit for the room. I don\'t know why people complain about this, as most hotels do require some sort of deposit. We just put the deposit on our credit card and had it refunded to us afterwards. No issue at all.Our room was large and clean. All rooms at Lebua are suites, so you\'ll have some great ammentities to use. The hotel is about a 5-10 minute walk to the nearest BTR, so make sure you use the BTR to get around town. Its very clean, safe and gas great AC, much better then getting ripped off by cab drivers. As well, across the street from the hotel is "Tealicious Cafe", a great place to grab some food!The ONLY issue we had with the Hotel was our cable box wouldn\'t work during the entire stay, and the front desk staff tried multiple times to resolve the issue, but it turned out to be an issue affecting the entire floor. I asked to speak to the manager on duty, and she apologized profusely and provided us 4 drink vouchers to the Skybar, which was a great apology gift! Obviously, if this is my only complaint about the hotel, that should show you how great of a hotel this is. My wife especially loved the turn down service, as they made our bed perfect for sliding right in after we got ready for bed. It\'s hard to explain, but it was such a small gesture but we really loved how they made our bed for the evening. Great service guys!Overall, this hotel was amazing! Rooms are large, clean and you don\'t hear much from the neighbors either. Staff are VERY friendly and helpful. Ashvin Kumar (hotel GM) greeted us upon our departure and thanked us for our business. A wonderful touch of service and shows you how dedicated this hotel is to customer service. Next time we get to visit Bangkok, I\'ll be sure to use Lebua again.'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Fabulous hotel! We loved it! ', 'body': "We had a wonderful stay at this hotel and would recommend it to anybody looking for a special stay in Bangkok! The staff were fantastic, the rooms were so spacious and had everything you could possibly need! The views are just spectacular! Definitely worth getting access to the tower club, we had a lovely complimentary afternoon tea here. The breakfast was the best we experienced by far on our trip, such an extensive selection. Can't recommend it enough!"}, {'points': {'Location': '4 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Value': '4 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Great hotel, cozy spacious rooms with an amazing view!', 'body': 'Our experience was exceptional! The hotel is beautiful, well situated and the staff is very kind and welcoming. The room are very spacious and cozy - the only disappointment was that the balcony with the amazing views was locked because we traveled with kids. But then again, we managed to have a visit to the Skylounge bar to enjoy the view in all its glory. Breakfast is fantastic as well Definitely plan to come back next time in Bangkok'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '4 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Bangkok ', 'body': 'Service is amazing. Rooms are really clean. Food (especially Thai) is good with spice tempered for less adventurous. Gluten free options are limited resulting in a lot of saladLocation is ok - it is easy to get to the sky train and you are 15 min from Siam Paragon mall.Definitely a return visit if I come back to Bangkok.'}, {'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'What an amazing place', 'body': 'This place was an absolute dream. I travelled with 3 others around Thailand and this was our last stop before the flight back. The staff upgraded the 4 of us to a 2 bed apartment which was outstanding. The breakfast is an absolute banquet! high quality stuff, the pool is decent, the gym is clean and well presented, the staff are helpful, the hotel is spotless. The only negative is the hidden deposit fees that I was not aware of. Highly recommended and I would definitely stay again :)'}]
